page.title: 16Somerleyton Village and Hall
page.content: Somerleyton Village Somerleyton green is in the middle of Somerleyton. There are nineteen houses. Nine of the houses have porches. Two of the house have greenhouses. The houses belong to Lord Somerleyton. People that live in them rent the houses from him. Parts of the houses are wooden. They have lattice windows and there are bird tables in the gardens. Somerleyton Hall Somerleyton Hall has pretty gardens that you can walk round. It has a miniature railway and maze. You can go in the house and look round. In the gardens, some of the trees are 200 years old. For the children, they have swings and things to play on.
